Milken 's brother , Lowell Milken , and a former Drexel trader , Bruce L. Newberg

the New York-based investment banking firm

the end of Milken 's 20-year career at the firm

Princeton/Newport Partners , in which Drexel and Milken allegedly helped Princeton/Newport carry out tax fraud through sham securities trades with Drexel
his brother 's principal adviser in the conduct of the conspiracy
civil charges filed by the Securities and Exchange Commission

a major sticking point in the talks
Michael Milken of a prolonged pattern of insider trading , stock market manipulation and defrauding clients
a prolonged pattern of insider trading , stock market manipulation and defrauding clients
